titleStmt.title: The kingdom of darkness: or the history of d√¶mons, specters, witches, apparitions, possessions, disturbances, and other wonderful and supernatural delusions, mischievous feats, and malicious impostures of the Devil Containing near fourscore memorable relations, forreign and domestick, both antient and modern. Collected from authentick records, real attestations, credible evidences, and asserted by authors of undoubted verity. Together with a preface obviating the common objections and allegations of the sadduces and atheists of the age, who deny the being of spirits, witches, &c. With pictures of several memorable accidents. By R. B. Licensed and entred according to order.
titleStmt.author: R. B., 1632?-1725?
Drapentier, Jan, fl. 1674-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Crouch at the Bell in the Poultrey near Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: R.B. stands for Richard or Robert Burton, the pseudonym of Nathaniel Crouch.
With an added engraved title page (plate) "The kingdom of darknes."; signed "I. Drapentier sculpt."
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
